34 using namespace std;

36 namespace Mutation {
37  namespace Kinetics {
38 
39 void StoichiometryManager::addReaction(const int rxn, const vector<int>& sps)
40 {
41  switch (sps.size()) {
42  case 1:
43  m_stoich1_vec.push_back(Stoich1(rxn, sps[0]));
44  break;
45  case 2:
46  m_stoich2_vec.push_back(Stoich2(rxn, sps[0], sps[1]));
47  break;
48  case 3:
49  m_stoich3_vec.push_back(Stoich3(rxn, sps[0], sps[1], sps[2]));
50  break;
51  default:
52  throw InvalidInputError("number of species", sps.size())
53  << "Error trying to add reaction with more than 3 "
54  << "species on a single side.";
55  }
56 }
57 
58 #define STOICH_MGR_APPLY_FUNC(__my_func__,__stoic_func__)\
59 template<class Iterator, class Vec1, class Vec2>\
60 inline static void _##__my_func__ (\
61  Iterator begin, const Iterator end, const Vec1& input, Vec2& output)\
62 {\
63  for (; begin != end; ++begin)\
64  begin-> __stoic_func__ (input, output);\
65 }\
66 void StoichiometryManager:: __my_func__ (\
67  const double* const in, double* const out) const\
68 {\
69  _##__my_func__ (m_stoich1_vec.begin(), m_stoich1_vec.end(), in , out );\
70  _##__my_func__ (m_stoich2_vec.begin(), m_stoich2_vec.end(), in , out );\
71  _##__my_func__ (m_stoich3_vec.begin(), m_stoich3_vec.end(), in , out );\
72 }
73 
74 STOICH_MGR_APPLY_FUNC(multReactions, multReaction)
75 STOICH_MGR_APPLY_FUNC(incrReactions, incrReaction)
76 STOICH_MGR_APPLY_FUNC(decrReactions, decrReaction)
77 
78 STOICH_MGR_APPLY_FUNC(incrSpecies, incrSpecies)
79 STOICH_MGR_APPLY_FUNC(decrSpecies, decrSpecies)
80 
81 #undef STOICH_MGR_APPLY_FUNC
